price: 9. seehadaytuh nek yan niqmat kaah neceeh kaa tammosnek, tohuk lakal nanu too niqmat kaak seelabnek, diggah usuk Yallih Racmatak kaxxam yabboodi kay niqmat kaxxam yangaddi kinni.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنَّا رَحۡمَةٗ ثُمَّ نَزَعۡنَٰهَا مِنۡهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٞ كَفُورٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnā al-insāna minnā raḥmatan thumma nazaʿnāhā min'hu innahu layaūsun kafūrun
